mapper.sql: id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into tb_student (id, parentId, version, code, name, remarks, sortNum, is_Enable, is_Delete, ownerId, createId, updateId, createTime, updateTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_student set parentId = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = version+1, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sortNum = #{sortNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_Enable = #{is_Enable,jdbcType=BIT}, is_Delete = #{is_Delete,jdbcType=BIT}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateId = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update tb_student set is_Delete = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
